comment.author: 31173560@N05
comment._content:
Instant favorite!  I love all things aviation, vintage and historical photos, and WWII era memorabilia.  This fits into all three categories.  What an awesome find!  Thank you so much for sharing this.

This gal must have been a real ground breaker.  Women pilots are rare even in this day and age.

comment.author: 59986579@N06
comment._content: This is a picture of my Aunt.  I wasn't even born at the time this picture was taken.  Aunt Jean has sense past away.  I wonder what the fate of that plane was.  Would love to know the call #'s on the plane.
